title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Targeting Hezbollah Terror Infrastructure in Lebanon after Missile Launches”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked several targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanon

A short while ago, Air Force fighter jets attacked two terror infrastructures, an operational command, and one military target of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanon.

During the day, several launches from Lebanon towards Israeli territory were identified in the areas of Misgav Am and Goren, which fell in open fields. In addition, missile launches were identified towards the areas of Zra’it, Shomera, and Kfar Yuval. The launch at Kfar Yuval hit a house and several Israeli casualties are reported.

The IDF is attacking throughout the day in Lebanese territory.

Attached is documentation of IDF attacks in Lebanon: https://bit.ly/48xFEoW
